message:
Hi Folks, Do you have any recommendations for a software that 

1- allow reading different books formats (epub, pdf at least) 
2- sync the annotations and last page across different devices (macOs, Android, IOS)

I have done a lot of research but non of the available solutions is able to satisfy  these conditions. 

For those who love annotating books, how do you handle this across devices ?

BTW, if there is no free options, I will be willing to purchase a good app that is able to do this :)

data.message: Application ibooks on iPad, it is the best reader for epub and ibooks
FYI: Google Books solves the problem ! :)
I think Kindle is great in terms of syncing https://www.amazon.com/gp/kindle/kcp
